extension.summary: Unofficial Raspberry Pi configuration add-on for OpenELEC
extension.description: This XBMC add-on for OpenELEC allows Raspberry Pi settings such as overclocking to be configured without having to manually edit /flash/config.txt.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on has the potential to void the warranty of your Raspberry Pi. Use at your own risk!
